channel.title: New Miller Nichols Library Materials
channel.description: New materials cataloged for Miller Nichols Library

item.title: Arrancame la vida / Angeles Mastretta.
Incorporate your business : the national corporation kit / by Daniel Sitarz.
The Conde Nast traveler book of unforgettable journeys : great writers on great places / edited and with an introduction by Klara Glowczewska.
Good fellas : [screenplay] / by Nicholas Pileggi and Martin Scorsese ; based on the book by Nicholas Pileggi.
Godzilla : [screenplay] / by Dean Devlin and Roland Emmerich
Writing across distances & disciplines : research and pedagogy in distributed learning / Joyce Magnotto Neff, Carl Whithaus.

Journalism of the highest realm : the memoir of Edward Price Bell, pioneering foreign correspondent for the Chicago daily news / edited by Jaci Cole and John Maxwell Hamilton ; foreword by James F. Hoge, Jr.
Get Shorty : screenplay / by Scott Frank ; from the novel by Elmore Leonard.
Investigation : [screenplay] / by Paul Schrader ; from a screenplay by Elio Petri and U. Pirro.
Changes in transport and non-transport costs : local vs global impacts in a spatial network / by K. Behrens ... [et al.].
The sectoral distribution of money supply in the euro area / by Giuseppe Ferrero, Andrea Nobili and Patrizia Passiglia.
University dropout : the case of Italy / by Federico Cingano and Piero Cipollone
The foregone gains of incomplete portfolios / by Monica Paiella.
Un nuovo metodo per misurare la dotazione territoriale di infrastrutture di transporto / di Giovanna Messina.
Measurement of income distribution in supranational entities : the case of the European Union / by A. Brandolini ... [et al.].
Employment, innovation and productivity : evidence from Italian microdata / by Bronwyn H. Hall, Francesca Lotti and Jacques Mairesse.
Why demand uncertainty curbs investment : evidence from a panel of Italian manufacturing firms / by Maria Elena Bontempi, Roberto Golinelli and Giuseppe Parigi.
Intertemporal consumption choices, transaction costs and limited participation in financial markets : reconciling data and theory / by Orazio P. Attanasio and Monica Paiella.
Checking for understanding : formative assessment techniques for your classroom / Douglas Fisher and Nancy Frey.
Formalitas und modus intrinsecus : die Entwicklung der scotischen Metaphysik bei Franciscus de Mayronis / Hannes Mohle.
Interactive marketing & media.
OECD economic surveys. Ukraine.
Serenity found : more unauthorized essays on Joss Whedon's Firefly universe / edited by Jane Espenson, with Leah Wilson.
The will to heal : psychological recovery in the novels of Latina writers / Felicia Lynne Fahey.
White man's club : schools, race, and the struggle of Indian acculturation / Jacqueline Fear-Segal.
The tyranny of the market : why you can't always get what you want / Joel Waldfogel.
Taking action, saving lives : our duties to protect environmental and public health / Kristin Shrader-Frechette.
Hunting serial predators / G. Maurice Godwin.
A grammar of Crow = Apsaalooke Alilaau / Randolph Graczyk.
Global trends in income inequality / Almas Heshmati.
Escaping Plato's cave : how America's blindness to the rest of the world threatens our survival / Mort Rosenblum.
Dandelion : memoir of a free spirit / Catherine James.
Beyond hell and back : how America's Special Operations Forces became the world's greatest fighting unit / Dwight Jon Zimmerman and John D. Gresham.
Auto mania : cars, consumers, and the environment / Tom McCarthy.
The age of everything : how science explores the past / Matthew Hedman.
What we say goes : conversations on U.S. power in a changing world : interviews with David Barsamian / Noam Chomsky.
Violent politics : a history of insurgency, terrorism & guerrilla war, from the American Revolution to Iraq / William R. Polk.
US labor in trouble and transition : the failure of reform from above, the promise of revival from below / Kim Moody.
The U.S. Marine Corps in World War II : the stories behind the photos / Steve Crawford.
The terror dream : fear and fantasy in post-9/11 America / Susan Faludi.
Ten discoveries that rewrote history / Patrick Hunt.
Stereotype dynamics : language-based approaches to the formation, maintenance, and transformation of stereotypes / editors, Yoshihisa Kashima, Klaus Fiedler, Peter Freytag.
Seduced by madness : the true story of the Susan Polk murder case / Carol Pogash.
Roman's journey : a memoir of survival / Roman Halter ; preface by Martin Gilbert.
Hollywood highbrow : from entertainment to art / Shyon Baumann.
God and Hillary Clinton : a spiritual life / Paul Kengor.
First class citizenship : the civil rights letters of Jackie Robinson / edited by Michael G. Long.
Ethos and behavior : the English novel from Jane Austen to Henry James (including George Meredith, W.M. Thackeray, George Eliot, and Thomas Hardy) / Gregory F. Tague.
Endowed : regulating the male sexed body / Michael Thomson.
Breaking through : John B. McLendon, basketball legend and civil rights pioneer / Milton S. Katz.
